name: alexa-skill-lambda
description: Alexa Skill (API version 3) for the Globo Lighting Fabiola ceiling fan.
author: Max Stark

scripts.package: npm run clean && cd ./src && npm install --only=production && cd .. && gulp package
scripts.deploy: npm run package && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name arn:aws:lambda:eu-west-1:486499780964:function:alexa-skill-globo-fan --zip-file fileb://target/alexa-skill-lambda.zip
